content:
PeerInvitationResponse Class

Definition

Represents a response received from a remote peer to an invitation sent via the stem.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.Invite* or stem.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.Invite* method.

In this Article

public class PeerInvitationResponse
Inheritance
Object
PeerInvitationResponse

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

This class does not have a public constructor. The PeerInvitationResponseType class is used to encapsulate the response to accommodate the return of any additional data with a future release.

Properties

PeerInvitationResponseType

Gets or sets the response to the invitation from the remote peer specified by PeerInvitationResponseType class.

public System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType PeerInvitationResponseType { get; }
Value
PeerInvitationResponseType

PeerInvitationResponseType object containing the response from an invitation to a remote peer.
